hackathon-description-text: At our hackathon, your team of 4 will be able choose an hour of the day and create a conceptual mobile VR product to showcase how you can transform daily routines with VR.
hackathon-rules: You can read our Code of Conduct
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=150 Broadway, New York, NY 10038, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Please visit our website for a full breakdown of judging criteria:

hackathon-description-header: Think about how mobile transformed how you manage your everyday life; Now, re-imagine what this daily routine would look like in virtual reality.
